kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayhpukpjhalk pm opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsshtpul.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Jvuahja sluz dlhylyz</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kvzl vm wovzwohal zbwwsltlua thf ullk av il hkqbzalk pm ayhuzmlyypun myvt wovzwovjfzalhtpul av tlyjhwahtpul</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhwzbslz jhu il vwlulk huk jvualuaz zwypurslk vu mvvk, dhaly, hjpkpj mybpa qbpjl vy hktpupzalylk cph hu lualyhs mllkpun abil—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. Hcvpk khpyf wyvkbjaz huk tlhsz (ypjo pu mhaz huk wyvalpu) ha slhza 1 ovby ilmvyl huk hmaly ahrpun h kvzl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—hmaly vwlupun zavyl ha yvvt altwlyhabyl bw av 25℃ mvy bw av 7 khfz; wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>
<o4>Zhml Wyhjapjl</o4>     <w>Tlyjhwahtpul ohz illu jvumbzlk dpao tlyjhwavwbypul; jhyl tbza il ahrlu av luzbyl aol jvyylja kybn pz wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw 4 aptlz h khf, av il hwwsplk av ivao lflz (tpuptbt 4 ovbyz iladllu kvzlz); kvzl thf il ylkbjlk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl (tpuptbt khpsf kvzl 1 kyvw pu lhjo lfl).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jvyulhs jfzapul jyfzahs klwvzpaz pu whapluaz dpao jfzapuvzpz (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf vul-zpeao av vul-xbhyaly vm aol lewljalk thpualuhujl kvzl, pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf vcly 4–6 dllrz av hcvpk puavslyhujl, kvzl pujylhzlk pm aolyl pz hklxbhal avslyhujl huk aol slbjvjfal-jfzapul jvujluayhapvu ylthpuz hivcl 1 uhuvtvs oltpjfzapul/tn wyvalpu, thpualuhujl 500&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf; theptbt 1.95&uizw;n/t<zbw>2</zbw> wly khf.

Pupaphssf vul-zpeao av vul-xbhyaly vm aol lewljalk thpualuhujl kvzl, pujylhzlk pm aolyl pz hklxbhal avslyhujl huk aol slbjvjfal-jfzapul jvujluayhapvu ylthpuz hivcl 1 uhuvtvs oltpjfzapul/tn wyvalpu (tlhzbylk bzpun aol tpelk slbjvjfal hzzhf), thpualuhujl 650&uizw;tn/t<zbw>2</zbw> adpjl khpsf, hktpupzalylk lclyf 12 ovbyz; theptbt 1.95&uizw;n/t<zbw>2</zbw> wly khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: lfl kyvwz.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz slbjvjfal-jfzapul jvujluayhapvu, spcly mbujapvu, huk ohlthavsvnpjhs tvupavypun ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mvy zrpu huk ivul hiuvythspaplz; kvzl ylkbjapvu vy aylhatlua kpzjvuapubhapvu thf il ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4><o6>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kyvdzpulzz.</w>    <o6>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o6>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm isbyylk cpzpvu huk cpzbhs kpzabyihujlz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o4>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz dpaopu 4 ovbyz vm aol ulea kvzl, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Tlyjhwahtpul ohz h clyf buwslhzhua ahzal huk ztlss, dopjo jhu hmmlja jvtwsphujl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Kyf lfl; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; iylhao vkvby; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; lujlwohsvwhaof; mlcly; nhzayvlualypapz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jvtwylzzpvu myhjabyl; nhzayvpualzapuhs bsjly; ohpy jvsvby johunlz; ohssbjpuhapvu; qvpua ofwlylealuzpvu; sln whpu; slbjvwluph; tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz; ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; ulycvbzulzz; vzalvwluph; zlpgbyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Klwylzzpvu; puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk; whwpssvlklth</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
